meanings.definition: A person skilled at a variety of repairs or maintenance tasks.
meanings.sent1: The handyman fixed the leaky faucet in no time.
meanings.sent2: My neighbor is a reliable handyman who can repair anything.
meanings.sent3: The handyman joked that he could fix a broken heart too.
meanings.sent4: She saw him as a handyman of emotions, always there to mend her feelings.
meanings.sent5: The handyman's toolbox was like a magic chest of solutions.

meanings.definition: A man who is adept at fixing things around the house.
meanings.sent1: Our handyman neighbor helped us repair the fence last weekend.
meanings.sent2: Dad is our family handyman; he can repair anything from the toaster to the roof.
meanings.sent3: The handyman chuckled as he outsmarted a stubborn door lock.
meanings.sent4: He was a handyman of puzzles, always finding the missing piece.
meanings.sent5: The handyman's hands were like magic, bringing broken things back to life.
